    <entry>72794</entry>
  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120537</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120537</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Električni pretok in Gaussove ploskve</string>
            <string language="en">Flux and Gaussian Surfaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fluß und Gaußsche Oberflächen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flux et surfaces gaussiennes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo e superfícies gaussian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento continuo e superfici gaussiane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ροή και γκαουσσιανές επιφάνειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flux y superficies gaussian</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Različne Gaussove ploskve v električnem polju nabitega delca in električni pretok.</string>
            <string language="en">Different Gaussian surfaces and resulting electric flux in an electric field caused by point charge.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni pretok</string>
            <string language="en">electric flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedlicher Gaußscher Oberflächen und 
Resultierens elektrischer Fluß in einem elektrischen fangen 
verursacht durch Punktladung auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flux électrique gaussien différent de surfaces 
et de résulter dans un champ électrique provoqué par la charge de 
point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo elétrico gaussian diferente das 
superfícies e resultar em um campo elétrico causado pela carga do 
ponto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento continuo elettrico gaussiano 
differente risultare e delle superfici in un campo elettrico causato 
dalla carica del punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικές γκαουσσιανές επιφάνειες και προκύπτουσα 
ηλεκτρική ροή σε ένα ηλεκτρικό πεδίο που προκαλείται από τη 
δαπάνη σημείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diverso flux eléctrico gaussian de las 
superficies y el resultar en un campo eléctrico causado por la carga 
de la punta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
